original_title: Bill Champlin: In Concert: Ohne Filter
overview: Bill Champlin shows off his trademark blend of rock and blues in this concert recorded for the German television series "Ohne Filter." The show traces the singer-songwriter's career, from his early days with the Sons of Champlin to his solo albums. Backed by his four-piece band, Champlin delivers 11 songs, including "When Love Comes Around," "In the Heat of the Night," "Turn Your Love Around" and "Everywhere."
title: Bill Champlin: In Concert: Ohne Filter
